scripts.copy-php: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const blocks = ['accordion', 'avatar', 'form', 'form-field', 'yandex-map', 'html-blocks', 'swiper', 'menu', 'lists', 'contacts', 'search', 'social-icons', 'tables', 'tabulator', 'navbar', 'top-header', 'header-widgets']; blocks.forEach(block => { const src = path.join(__dirname, 'src/blocks', block, 'render.php'); const dest = path.join(__dirname, 'build/blocks', block, 'render.php'); if (fs.existsSync(src)) { fs.mkdirSync(path.dirname(dest), { recursive: true }); fs.copyFileSync(src, dest); console.log('Copied ' + block + '/render.php'); } });" && node scripts/copy-navbar-templates.js
scripts.build-theme-block: node -e "const path = require('path'); const blockPath = path.join(__dirname, '../../themes/horizons/blocks/practice-categories-grid'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); try { execSync('npx --yes @wordpress/scripts build blocks/practice-categories-grid/index.js --output-path=' + blockPath + ' --output-filename=index.js --config @wordpress/scripts/config/webpack.config.js', { cwd: path.join(blockPath, '../../..'), stdio: 'inherit' }); console.log('✅ Theme block built successfully'); } catch(e) { console.error('❌ Error:', e.message); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.i18n:update: npm run i18n:pot && npm run i18n:compile
